tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Venkat is an excellent physician. His expertise and compassionate approach are truly commendable. He always takes the time to listen and address all concerns thoroughly. I highly recommend him for anyone seeking top-notch medical care.

tags: None
review: Doctor was so keen and listened all issues of m wife facing he identified the issue and suggested medicine accordingly now my wife doing well as of now I highly recommend Dr. Venkata Rao.

tags: None
review: I took my mother to him and he listened to her in detail and confirmed her heart condition is good and has only gastric problem and suggested right medication

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Happened to visit Dr. R V Venkata Rao in Tesla Diagnostics, Gachibowli. He is very impatient and rude. I strongly recommend not to visit this doc ** ** *** ** **** ** **** *** ***** ********** **** ****** **** **** *** ** **** ********** * ****** After 2D-Echo I asked some doubts, upon which he started yelling *** *********** Doc should be polite towards his patients. Patients are already ill and upon which they get humiliated* * ******** ********* ****** ** ******** * **** ****** ******** **** ******* ** *** *******

tags: Wait time,
review: Really bad experience. Had booked for 9 A.M on Practo. Since last time doctor had not come after visiting I called ahead and checked and they said he will be in by 9.15. We reached at 9.15 and they kept saying 5 minutes 5 minutes and Doctor came only at 10 A.M. The receptionist is rude and started arguing when I asked at 9.45 if doctor is coming. I contacted Practo at 9.45 that 30 minutes is not honored and in front of me the receptionist lied that doctor has reached at 9.30 and we are the ones who are late. ****** ********* ** ******** *** ***** **** *** *** **** *** ******** ** *** ******** won't recommend this clinic. The doctor may be good but should honor time. On top of it none of them had a courtesy to apologise and in fact the reception lady has audacity to argue as if it is our mistake that we are not willing to wait

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: He treats you like a friend and assures are healthy. Doctor himself monitors the tests and suggests the treatment. Spends quality time instead of rushing to other patients.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
We are very happy took treatment for heart related disease from Dr. RV Venkata Rao Sir. Always be patience with patients while treatment. Thanks sir
I always recommend him whoever suffering with heart related dieases

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Patient friendly.  Explained to the core and advised confidently whether the patient can go for general anesthesia for a gynic procedure.  I recommend.

tags: None
review: Visited doctor due to discomfort in my shoulder and neck. Doctor made me feel calm and relaxed.. did all the test himself.. explained things properly..very caring..

tags: Wait time,Value for money,
review: Took appointment at 6:30 but doctor came at 7:30 and after that also had to wait for more than an hour to get our turn. Staff is very unfriendly.
